page.title: 09ARGUMENTS AGAINST THE MINE
page.content: We are against having a coal mine near Kenilworth because it will destroy the countryside in that area and destroy the homes of many animals.It will also ruin crops and farms etc.We do not like the idea of being a mining town and joining Coventry because our crime rate will increase.If there was a strike,we would be affected.Also,trucks carrying coal would be running through town and it would polute the air.Also it would ruin the roads.People might want to move out. It would also spoil the historic part of Kenilworth. The miners' sons might be punks and they would probably vandalise the town like smashing windows, spraying paint all over people's houses etc. People who live near the coalmine might be able to hear the buzzing and noise of lorries.
